channel.title: SHI - delayed paymenets?
channel.description:
A fair number of corporate customers use SHI as a reseller to purchase my products.
They are normally a good prompt payer - but recently (last 3 months) they have been very late.
Anyone else seeing this?

item.title: SHI - delayed paymenets?
item.dc:creator: Andy
item.description:
I try to make them pay in advance. They usually do. Afterall the customer has already told them to get the software, so they arenâ€™t in a great bargaining position.

Read full topic
